title: The legacy gap: Why ERPs, CRMs and APIs can’t fix this.

cards.content: Billions have been spent digitizing enterprises, yet the orchestration of networks remains unsolved. Each disruption - COVID-19, ESG mandates, demand swings and supply shocks has only magnified the cost: lost revenue, shrinking margins and broken trust.
Traditional systems were built to optimize within a single company. They centralize data and streamline KPIs, but they were never designed to coordinate dozens of independent organizations.

APIs connect partners, but they don’t align them. Data flows in disjointed hub-and-spoke patterns - delayed and incomplete. When disruption strikes, no one has a unified view, coordination breaks down and costs escalate.
